extension.title: Google Extension
extension.label: Google
extension.description: This extension contains functions for embedding Google maps, charts, and widgets.

function.name: Search
function.description: Embed results for web, images, videos, news, blogs, and books search
function.param: Search options. (one of 'all', 'partial', or 'none'; default: { web: 'partial', local: 'partial', images: 'partial', videos: 'partial', news: 'partial', blogs: 'partial', books: 'partial' })

head.script: function google_ctrlexec_data(c, m, d) { if(DekiWiki.hasValue(m.text)) d.ctrl.execute(m.text); }

function.name: Feed
function.description: Embed a control to show an Atom/RSS feed
function.param: max number of entries to return (default: 4)

function.name: Feeds
function.description: Embed a control to show Atom/RSS feeds
function.param: list of feed objects (Atom or RSS) (e.g. [{ uri : "http://feeds.feedburner.com/Mindtouch", label: "MindTouch" }, ...]; default: [])
max number of entries to return (default: 4)
